QuestData.Title: Puzzling...
QuestData.Description: Something about this scrap of metal prevents you from casting it aside.$b$bPerhaps Raelorasz might be able to shed some light on its purpose.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Scintillating Fragment to Raelorasz at the Transitus Shield.
QuestData.RewardText: It was wise of you to bring this to me, $n.$b$b<Raelorasz eyes the fragment and slowly nods.>$b$bIf you truly desire to contribute to our efforts, no matter the risk, I shall share with you its meaning.
